scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: File contains vaqrious materials relating to Taconic Foundation investments and program directions. Includes material on the Poverty and Race Research Action Council, Pratt Institute Center, Smokey House, andthe Urban Homesteading Assistance Board, as well as reports on Out-of-School Time programs. File was originally labeled "Miscellaneous."

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials in this file are restricted.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: File consists mainly of correspondence with Jane Lee and other trustees, concerning board and foundation business; but it also includes some administrative or grant-related correspondence. Materials were originally filed under "Letter."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: File contains annual or biannual breakdowns of grant funding by program area.

scopecontent.p: File contains statements of the funding guidelines for grant applicants.

scopecontent.p: Annual lists of grants, broken down by program area.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: File contains drafts of Susan Saegert's report on Limited Equity Housing Cooperatives, and memos concerning its distribution.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: File contains draft of and comments on Taconic-funded paper "New Markets Tax Credits: Issues and Opportunities," by P. Jefferson Armistead.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: File contains briefing papers and other materials relating to the National Low-Income Housing Coalition's 2005 National Housing Voucher Summit. The Taconic Foundation was a cosponsor of the meeting.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes memos by John Simon and Melvin Mister.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: File concerns possible programs within four targeted areas: Affordable Housing and Community Development, Race Relations, Social Entrepreneurship, and Youth organizations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes Articles and Reports Consulted.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Taconic Foundation conducted a survey of grantee organizations concerning the effects of the economic downturn.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: File contains summary statements on organizations put forward for spend-down grant funding in 2009. Includes information on their programs, funding history, sources of support, and reasons for recommending them.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Materials relate to investigations of Residential Schools and Summer Learning initiatives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Materials date from 2004-2005 and concern Taconic's funding history and guidelines and its narrowing focus on community and youth development. In February 2004 Taconic produced its "Opportunities for Community Development: A Brief Survey for Small Foundations," as a kind of a roadmap for its program direction.
